title: Responsible AI & Security Guidelines
text: Projects must follow privacy-by-design, data minimization, PII handling, bias evaluation, model monitoring, and incident response procedures. Include DPIA where applicable...

title: Enterprise SDLC & Phase Gates
text: Phases: initiation, discovery, planning, build, test, deploy, hypercare. Each requires deliverables: BRD, architecture review, threat model, test plan, UAT sign-off...

title: Reference Cloud Architecture
text: Three-tier architecture with API gateway, autoscaling app tier, managed DB with read replicas, IaC via Terraform, CI/CD with canary releases, monitoring with...
